Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the treatment of immigrants in the U.S. illegally, stating that they are "treated better than our vets" without providing sufficient evidence to support this assertion.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to back up the statement that immigrants in the U.S. illegally are treated better than veterans.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that immigrants in the U.S. illegally are treated better than veterans without providing any evidence or context to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the treatment of immigrants in the U.S. illegally and veterans that are not addressed in the claim.
